i1.name: Echoing Flames
description: {{sbc|Innate:}} '''Urgot's''' six legs each conceal a shotgun that covers an arc, together forming a full circle of cover around him. Each shotgun has one shell and an individual reload timer.

The next basic attack [[on-hit]] in the direction and range of a ''loaded'' shotgun causes it to fire, instantly dealing {{as|{{pp|6|key=%|40 to 100|1;6;9;11;13;15}} AD}} {{as|(+ {{pp|5|changedisplay=true|key=%|2 to 6|1;6;9;11;13}} of target's '''maximum''' health)}} {{as|physical damage}} to enemies in a cone, up to {{pp|60 to 360}} against monsters.
i1.notes:
* ''Echoing Flames'':
** Will not trigger while {{tip|Blind|blinded}} or if the basic attack is blocked by {{cai|Wind Wall|Yasuo}}.
** Will not trigger versus wards.
** Will trigger from {{iis|Runaan's Hurricane}} additional bolts.
** Will not apply {{sti|life steal}}, but {{sti|spell vamp}} at 33% effectiveness.
** Will apply [[spell effect]]s.
** When basic attacking certain units (e.g {{cai|Jack in the Box|Shaco}}), ''Echoing Flames'' does not trigger, however it will trigger when attacking them with {{ai|Purge|Urgot}}.
* '''Urgot's''' legs never change in orientation, with his body instead rotating on top of them - i.e. the leg that faces north will always face north. This does not affect '''Urgot's''' facing direction for the purposes of abilities such as {{ai|Petrifying Gaze|Cassiopeia}}.

q1.name: Corrosive Charge
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Urgot''' launches a canister at the target location that explodes after {{fd|0.6}} seconds, dealing {{as|physical damage}} and {{tip|slow|slowing}} all enemies hit for 1 second.

w1.name: Purge
description: {{sbc|Passive:}} '''Urgot's''' other abilities apply '''''{{as|Purge|buzzword2}}''''' to enemy champions for 5 seconds. Only one enemy champion can be marked at a time.

{{sbc|Active:}} For 4 seconds, '''Urgot''' is {{tip|ghosted}}, gains 40% {{stil|slow resist}} and autonomously [[basic attack]]s the nearest enemy at {{sti|attack speed|{{as|{{fd|3.0}} attack speed}}}}, prioritizing enemy champions marked for '''''{{as|Purging|buzzword2}}''''', refreshing the mark with every attack. He can keep attacking without interrupting his movement, but while firing his {{as|'''base''' movement speed}} is reduced by 125.
Attacks deal modified damage, down to a minimum of 50 damage against minions, with only 50% [[on-hit]] damage and cannot {{tip|critically strike}}.
After {{fd|0.5}} seconds, '''Urgot''' can reactivate ''Purge'' to end all effects.
At maximum rank, ''Purge'' lasts indefinitely and becomes a toggled ability.
w1.notes:
* ''Purge'' can be cast during other abilities.
* At maximum rank, ''Purge'' still has a static cooldown of {{fd|0.5}} seconds between 2 activation, even though the cooldown is marked at 0 seconds.
* Before maximum rank, if continuously attacking without interrupting or canceling the cast, '''Urgot''' will shoot 13 attacks.
* The bolts are considered basic attacks and thus apply {{sti|life steal}}. The lifesteal is applied at full efficiency.
* '''Urgot's''' attack commands during ''Purge'' instead issue movement commands.
* The reduction in base movement speed by ''Purge'' is not affected by slow resistance.
* Percentage {{tip|slow|slows}} apply after the flat movement reduction.
* Using {{cis|Urgot}} ''other abilities'' will extend the duration of ''Purge'' briefly to compensate for the animation time.
* ''Purge'' will apply {{ii|Runaan's Hurricane}} on every shot at 100% of the listed damage.
** On hit effects applied by {{ii|Runaan's Hurricane}} are reduced to 50% damage.
* '''Urgot''' will not attack during the cast times of his other abilities.

e1.name: Disdain
description: After {{fd|0.25}} seconds, '''Urgot''' {{tip|dash|dashes}} in the target direction, though not through terrain, dealing {{as|physical damage}} to all enemies in the way and {{tip|airborne|knocking them aside}}.
'''Urgot''' comes to a stop upon colliding with an enemy champion, {{tip|airborne|flinging}} them over himself and {{tip|stun|stunning}} them for {{fd|0.75}} seconds after they land.

effects.str: • Shield Strength: (+ 150% bonus AD) (+ 15% bonus health)

r1.name: Fear Beyond Death
description: {{sbc|First Cast:}} After a {{fd|0.5}}-second delay, '''Urgot''' fires a chem-drill forward that impales the first enemy champion struck, dealing {{as|physical damage}}, leashing them for 4 seconds and {{tip|slow|slowing}} them by {{as|{{pp|type=target's '''missing''' health|11|key=%|0 to 75|key1=%|0 to 75|formula=1% per 1% missing health. ''This is capped at 75%''}}|health}}.

If the target is below {{as|{{sti|health|25% of their '''maximum''' health}}}}, ''Fear Beyond Death'' can be re-activated, and automatically does so after 4 seconds if the target is within the threshold.

{{sbc|Second Cast:}} '''Urgot''' begins {{tip|channel|channeling}} as he launches chains at the target, {{tip|suppression|suppressing}} them and pushing them up to {{tt|1000|Estimated}} units away, after which they're reeled in over {{tt|{{fd|1.5}}|Estimated}} seconds, during which they are {{tip|untargetable}} by other effects.
If the channel is successful, the target is {{as|executed|true damage}} and surrounding enemies are {{tip|flee|terrified}} for {{fd|1.5}} seconds, {{tip|slow|slowing}} them by 75%.
r1.notes:
* '''Urgot''' can move while channeling and while executing his target.
* Reactivating the ability early will reel the target as soon as they reach the {{as|25% maximum health}} threshold.
** The ability will reactivate and execute regardless of '''Urgot''' being [[Crowd control|crowd controlled]] or not, including self- or enemy-imposed {{tip|stasis}}.
* The second cast's chains are classified as projectile and can be stopped if:
** '''Urgot''' dies.
** The enemy becomes [[Untargetability|untargetable]].
** The enemy is {{ai|Black Shield|Morgana|CC-immune}}.
* {{tip|spell shield|Spell shields}} will '''not''' block the chains.
* When the chains start reeling in and suppressing a player's champion, chains will also cover the sides of their screen.
* The target will die regardless of their current health once the second cast's chains hit, even if they are healed by {{ai|Wish|Soraka}} (which can affect untargetable allies) or have a [[shield]] that persists the duration of the channel that places them above the health threshold.
** If the target has {{tip|invulnerability}} that persists the duration of the channel, it will protect them from the execution - e.g. {{ai|Undying Rage|Tryndamere}}, which can be activated during the suppression.
** The effect will also not prevent the activation of revival effects, such as {{ii|Guardian Angel}} or {{cai|Rebirth|Anivia}}.
** Despite being untargetable, {{ci|Kalista}} can still {{ai|Fate's Call|Kalista|pull her Oathsworn}} out of the execution.
** Death-triggered passives ({{cai|Death Defied|Karthus}}, {{cai|Icathian Surprise|Kog'Maw}}, and {{cai|Glory in Death|Sion}}) will be triggered.
** Only the target's current health will count as '''Urgot's''' damage in post-game statistics and [[spell vamp]] healing.
